what: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
title: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
text: R package containing RStudio Addin insert pre-written divs classes Quarto documents. ‘quartostamp’? physically stamp pre-prepared type literal quarto document; can digitally stamp pre-written elements qmd file. See package website full list available functions Quarto website full Quarto documentation. Please add requests GitHub issues, raise pull request.

title: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
text: install package GitHub, run following restart RStudio: use: Put cursor Quarto file ’d like insert element. Alternatively, highlight text like use body element. Click ‘RStudio Addins’ dropdown top RStudio IDE. Scroll/search ‘QUARTOSTAMP’ click function want. Use help files learn function. start stamp_ can search like ?stamp_notes. can also create custom RStudio keyboard shortcuts functions: Go ‘Tools’ ‘Modify Keyboard Shortcuts…’ Search {quartostamp} function want shortcut . Click ‘Shortcut’ column type key combination want use. Click ‘Apply’.

title: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
text:
packages can used alongside {quartostamp} writing document: {remedy} package contains RStudio Addin large number R Markdown helpers, e.g. ‘H2’ add leading hashmarks (##) signify level-two header {htmltools} package functions insert HTML tags, e.g. tags$h2() insert

level-two header

title: Insert 'Caution' Callout Block — stamp_callout_caution
text: Insert callout-block div type 'caution', orange accent traffic-cone icon. embed text selected user, otherwise skeleton help text inserted.

title: Insert 'Caution' Callout Block — stamp_callout_caution
text: Nothing. Text updated active document.

title: Insert 'Caution' Callout Block — stamp_callout_caution
text: output looks like user selected text:
code: :::{.callout-caution collapse=false appearance='default' icon=true} ## Optional caption (caution) - Hide callout body with 'collapse=true' - Remove 'collapse' to prevent expandability - Set appearance to 'default', 'simple' or 'minimal' - Remove icon with 'icon=false' :::

title: Insert 'Caution' Callout Block — stamp_callout_caution
text: Quarto documentation website.

title: Insert Footnote — stamp_footnote
text: Insert footnote marker skeleton text. user selects text using function, modified version used fill footnote label text instead (punctuation removed, spaces replaced hyphens text made lowercase).

title: Insert Footnote — stamp_footnote
text: clip Logical. footnote string added clipboard user can paste bottom document? Defaults TRUE.

title: Insert Footnote — stamp_footnote
text: Nothing. Text updated active document footnote added clipboard clip = TRUE.

title: Insert Footnote — stamp_footnote
text: output looks like user selected text just wants insert footnote skeleton:   console print:   output looks like user selected text using function:   console print:
code: Here is some text you wrote [^footnote]. ℹ Copy the footnote '[^footnote]: Insert description'. ℹ Paste it at the bottom of your document and adjust the description. ℹ Ensure your footnote labels are unique. Here is some text[^some-text] you wrote. ℹ The footnote '[^some-text]: Insert description.' was added to the clipboard. ℹ Paste it at the bottom of your document and adjust the description. ℹ Ensure your footnote labels are unique.

title: Insert Footnote — stamp_footnote
text: Quarto documentation website.

title: quartostamp 0.1.0
text: Allowed functions include text selected user (appropriate), rather just inserting simple skeleton (closes #6, thank @Lextuga007). Added DRY utils functions replace text common callout-box code. Added messaging users know footnote added clipboard. Updated function documentation reflect changes. Added {clipr} {cli}. Bump version v0.1.0.

title: quartostamp 0.0.0.9001
text: Added callout blocks stamp_callout_*() (#1, suggested @IndrajeetPatil). Added sections reference page package website. Updated wording documentation throughout. Added ‘details’ ‘references’ function documentation.

title: quartostamp 0.0.0.9000
text: Set package license, news, readme. Added RStudio Addins infrastructure (inst/rstudio/addins.dcf). Added first stamp_() functions.
